## Goals
I aim to help improve understanding of knowledge gaps related to plant-microbe interactions to be able to help create innovative solutions to real world challenges within agriculture.

## Education
I completed my undergraduate degree in Cellular and Moleculary Biology at Coastal Carolina University in 2023. I am currently pursuing my PhD in Molecular and Evolutionary Systems Biology at the University of New Hampshire.
